title: Xiaomi is in trouble ... again
description:

►►► This video ◄◄◄  

This week Xiaomi got a massive fine in India for potential tax evasion, Google bought Raxium, a MicroLED Display maker and we got Wi-Fi 7 and UFS 4.0!

Episode 95
